entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High 23. Humidex 26. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
